Test Description: Verify page loads correctly with all essential elements
Preconditions: User has access to LMS DownPayment page, User is logged in
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to LMS DownPayment page
2. Wait for page to load completely
Expected Result:
1. Page header shows 'LMS - Down Payment'
2. CollectionBanner component displays correctly
3. LMSSearchFilter component is visible
4. Page background is gray-200
5. No errors are displayed

Test Description: Verify loading overlay appears during data fetch
Preconditions: User is on LMS DownPayment page
Test Steps:
1. Select a center from dropdown
2. Observe loading state
Expected Result:
1. LoadingOverlay component is displayed
2. Message shows 'Loading DownPayment Collections'
3. Loading overlay has correct data-testid
4. Page content is obscured during loading

Test Description: Verify center selection triggers data fetch
Preconditions: User is on LMS DownPayment page, Multiple centers available
Test Steps:
1. Open center dropdown
2. Select a specific center
3. Wait for data to load
Expected Result:
1. API call is made with selected centerId
2. Collections for selected center are displayed
3. Table shows filtered data
4. Toast notification shows API response message

Test Description: Verify user selection filters collections correctly
Preconditions: Center is selected, Users are loaded
Test Steps:
1. Select one or more users from dropdown
2. Observe table data
Expected Result:
1. Table shows only collections assigned to selected users
2. Data includes both collector and caller assignments
3. Filtered count updates correctly

Test Description: Verify 'Unassigned' filter shows unassigned collections
Preconditions: Center is selected, Collections with unassigned fields exist
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Unassigned' option from user dropdown
2. Observe table data
Expected Result:
1. Table shows collections where collector OR caller is empty
2. Collections with either field unassigned are included
3. Count reflects unassigned collections only

Test Description: Verify search functionality filters across multiple fields
Test Steps:
1. Enter text in search field
2. Type customer name/mobile/collector/caller/collectionId
Expected Result:
1. Table filters to show matching records
2. Search works on: customer name, mobile, collector name, caller name, collectionId
3. Search is case-insensitive
4. Results update in real-time

Test Description: Verify clearing search shows all filtered data
Preconditions: Search text is entered, Results are filtered
Test Steps:
1. Clear search text field
2. Observe table data
Expected Result:
1. Table shows all collections based on center/user filters
2. Search filter is removed
3. Full dataset (minus other filters) is displayed

Test Description: Verify no data shown when center not selected
Preconditions: User is on LMS DownPayment page
Test Steps:
1. Ensure no center is selected
2. Observe table state
Expected Result:
1. Table is empty
2. No API calls are made
3. No error messages displayed
4. Empty state is handled gracefully

Test Description: Verify no data shown when users not selected
Preconditions: Center is selected but no users selected
Test Steps:
1. Select a center
2. Ensure no users are selected
3. Observe table state
Expected Result:
1. Table is empty (Scenario B implementation)
2. No collections are displayed
3. Prevents showing unfiltered data

Test Description: Verify column sorting in ascending order
Test Steps:
1. Click on a sortable column header (e.g., Status)
2. Observe data order
Expected Result:
1. Data is sorted in ascending order
2. Sort icon shows ascending indicator
3. Data order matches sortConfig key and direction

Test Description: Verify column sorting in descending order
Test Steps:
1. Click same column header again
2. Observe data order
Expected Result:
1. Data is sorted in descending order
2. Sort icon shows descending indicator
3. Sort direction toggles correctly

Test Description: Verify sorting across different columns
Test Steps:
1. Sort by one column
2. Sort by different column
3. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. Previous sort is replaced by new sort
2. Only one column is sorted at a time
3. Sort state updates correctly

Test Description: Verify status column filtering
Test Steps:
1. Open status column filter dropdown
2. Select one or more status values
3. Observe table data
Expected Result:
1. Table shows only collections with selected statuses
2. Multi-select works correctly
3. Filter persists until changed

Test Description: Verify customer name column filtering
Test Steps:
1. Open customer column filter
2. Select one or more customer names
3. Observe filtered results
Expected Result:
1. Only collections for selected customers shown
2. Multi-select functionality works
3. Filter state is maintained

Test Description: Verify collector column filtering
Test Steps:
1. Open collector column filter
2. Select collector name(s)
3. Observe filtered data
Expected Result:
1. Shows collections assigned to selected collectors
2. 'Unassigned' option shows collections without collector
3. Multi-select works correctly

Test Description: Verify caller column filtering
Test Steps:
1. Open caller column filter
2. Select caller name(s)
3. Observe filtered data
Expected Result:
1. Shows collections assigned to selected callers
2. 'Unassigned' option shows collections without caller
3. Filter combines correctly

Test Description: Verify multiple column filters work together
Test Steps:
1. Apply status filter
2. Apply customer filter
3. Apply collector filter
4. Observe results
Expected Result:
1. All filters are applied together (AND logic)
2. Results match all selected filter criteria
3. Filter count updates correctly

Test Description: Verify collector can be assigned to collection
Test Steps:
1. Select a collection row
2. Choose collector from dropdown
3. Wait for API response
Expected Result:
1. API call made to assignUser with type 'COLLECTOR'
2. On success, collector is updated in table
3. Toast shows API success message
4. Local state updates correctly

Test Description: Verify caller can be assigned to collection
Test Steps:
1. Select a collection row
2. Choose caller from dropdown
3. Wait for API response
Expected Result:
1. API call made to assignUser with type 'CALLER'
2. On success, caller is updated in table
3. Toast shows API success message
4. State reflects new assignment

Test Description: Verify only one assignment at a time
Test Steps:
1. Initiate collector assignment
2. Immediately try caller assignment
3. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. Second assignment is blocked while first is in progress
2. assigningUser flag prevents concurrent calls
3. Only one API call executes at a time

Test Description: Verify error handling for failed assignment
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to assign collector/caller
2. Simulate API failure
3. Observe error handling
Expected Result:
1. Toast displays API error message
2. Assignment does not update locally
3. assigningUser flag resets
4. User can retry assignment

Test Description: Verify behavior when unassigning collector
Test Steps:
1. Select unassign/empty option for collector
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. No API call is made (as per current implementation)
2. UI state remains unchanged
3. No errors occur

Test Description: Verify correct users shown for collector/caller
Preconditions: Center users loaded with various roles
Test Steps:
1. View collector dropdown
2. View caller dropdown
3. Check available options
Expected Result:
1. Collector dropdown shows: CENTER_MANAGER, FIELD, FI_EXEC, SALES_EXEC, TECHN
2. Caller dropdown shows: TELE_CALLER
3. Users filtered by role_code correctly

Test Description: Verify collections fetch with correct parameters
Test Steps:
1. Select center
2. Observe API call parameters
Expected Result:
1. API called with orgId=1, centerId, collectionType='DP'
2. All three parameters are required
3. withCredentials: true is set

Test Description: Verify users are fetched for selected center
Test Steps:
1. Select center
2. Monitor API calls
Expected Result:
1. getUserList API called with centerId and roleCodes
2. REQUIRED_ROLE_CODES sent as params
3. Users excluding 'credit executive' are stored
4. Users mapped by centerId

Test Description: Verify duplicate API calls are prevented
Test Steps:
1. Select center A
2. Select center B
3. Select center A again
Expected Result:
1. Second selection of center A does not trigger API call
2. lastFetchedCenterRef prevents duplicate
3. fetchInProgressRef prevents concurrent calls

Test Description: Verify collections are transformed correctly
Test Steps:
1. Fetch collections
2. Examine transformed data structure
Expected Result:
1. Each collection has centerCollectors array
2. Each collection has centerCallers array
3. subtype field is populated from subType
4. Users are correctly separated by role

Test Description: Verify users are correctly mapped to centers
Test Steps:
1. Select center A
2. Select center B
3. View collections from both
Expected Result:
1. Each collection gets users for its specific center
2. usersByCenterId map maintains all center users
3. Collections show correct collector/caller options per center

Test Description: Verify row data updates correctly
Test Steps:
1. Trigger row update with allowed field
2. Pass updates to handleRowUpdate
3. Observe state change
Expected Result:
1. Only ALLOWED_UPDATE_FIELDS are accepted
2. Invalid fields are rejected and logged
3. Table data updates for specific collectionId
4. Other rows remain unchanged

Test Description: Verify invalid fields are rejected
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to update with disallowed field
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. Invalid fields are filtered out
2. Console warning is logged
3. Only valid fields are applied
4. No data corruption occurs

Test Description: Verify only whitelisted fields can update
Test Steps:
1. Review ALLOWED_UPDATE_FIELDS constant
2. Test each allowed field
3. Test disallowed fields
Expected Result:
1. Allowed: collectionStatus, pendingAmount, transactions, nextCallDate, lastCallDate
2. All other fields rejected
3. Validation works consistently

Test Description: Verify Excel download with filtered data
Test Steps:
1. Apply filters to get specific data
2. Click download button
3. Wait for download completion
Expected Result:
1. Download button shows loading state
2. exportFilteredCollectionData is called
3. Filename format: LMS_DownPayment_CenterName_YYYY-MM-DD
4. Excel file downloads successfully
5. Success toast shows record count

Test Description: Verify warning when no data to download
Test Steps:
1. Apply filters that return no results
2. Click download button
Expected Result:
1. Warning toast: 'No data available to download'
2. No download occurs
3. Button remains enabled

Test Description: Verify correct filename generation
Test Steps:
1. Initiate download
2. Check generated filename
Expected Result:
1. Format: LMS_DownPayment_{CenterName}_{CurrentDate}
2. Center name from: centerName, center_name, or name
3. Special characters replaced with underscores
4. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD (local system date)

Test Description: Verify filter info included in export
Test Steps:
1. Apply various filters
2. Initiate download
3. Check export parameters
Expected Result:
1. filterInfo includes: selectedCenter, selectedUsers, searchText
2. Column filters included: status, customer, collector, caller
3. Metadata helps understand exported data context

Test Description: Verify download button disabled during download
Test Steps:
1. Click download button
2. Observe button state during download
Expected Result:
1. Button shows loading spinner
2. Button is disabled during download
3. isDownloading state prevents multiple clicks
4. Button re-enables after completion

Test Description: Verify error handling for collections fetch failure
Test Steps:
1. Select center
2. Simulate API error
3. Observe error handling
Expected Result:
1. Error message displayed in UI
2. Toast shows API error message
3. allTableData set to empty array
4. Loading state resets
5. User can retry

Test Description: Verify graceful handling when users fetch fails
Test Steps:
1. Select center
2. Simulate users API failure
3. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. Empty array returned for users
2. Error logged to console
3. Collections still attempt to load
4. No crash occurs

Test Description: Verify handling of network timeout
Test Steps:
1. Initiate data fetch
2. Simulate network timeout
3. Observe handling
Expected Result:
1. Error caught in try-catch
2. Appropriate error message shown
3. Loading state resets
4. User can retry operation

Test Description: Verify handling of invalid/missing centerId
Test Steps:
1. Pass center without centerId
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. No API call made if centerId invalid
2. Data remains empty
3. No errors thrown
4. Graceful fallback

Test Description: Verify correct initial state on mount
Test Steps:
1. Open LMS DownPayment page
2. Check initial state values

Test Description: Verify filter state updates correctly
Test Steps:
1. Change center selection
2. Change user selection
3. Update search text
Expected Result:
1. filters state updates with each change
2. handleFilterChange receives newFilters
3. State reflects latest selections
4. Re-renders trigger data filtering

Test Description: Verify sort configuration state management
Test Steps:
1. Click column to sort ascending
2. Click same column to sort descending
3. Click different column
Expected Result:
1. sortConfig.key updates to clicked column
2. sortConfig.direction toggles asc/desc
3. Previous sort replaced by new sort

Test Description: Verify usersByCenterId map updates correctly
Test Steps:
1. Select center A (fetch users)
2. Select center B (fetch users)
3. Return to center A
Expected Result:
1. Map contains users for both centers
2. Each center has its own user list
3. Map persists across center switches
4. Users correctly retrieved from map

Test Description: Verify assigningUser flag behavior
Test Steps:
1. Start collector assignment
2. Check assigningUser state
3. Wait for completion
Expected Result:
1. assigningUser set to true during API call
2. Prevents concurrent assignments
3. Reset to false after completion
4. Works for both collector and caller

Test Description: Verify download button shows only with data
Test Steps:
1. Load page with no data
2. Load data with filters
3. Observe download button
Expected Result:
1. Button hidden when filteredAndSortedData is empty
2. Button visible when data exists
3. Conditional rendering works correctly

Test Description: Verify download button visual states
Test Steps:
1. Hover over download button
2. Click to download
3. Observe state changes
Expected Result:
1. Green background (bg-green-600) on normal state
2. Darker green on hover (hover:bg-green-700)
3. Gray background when disabled/downloading
4. Shows spinner during download

Test Description: Verify toast notifications for all actions
Test Steps:
1. Perform successful assignment
2. Trigger API error
3. Download data
4. Perform search with results
Expected Result:
1. Success toasts show API messages
2. Error toasts show API error messages
3. Warning for no download data
4. Info messages as appropriate
5. Only API messages shown (no duplicates)

Test Description: Verify empty state display
Preconditions: No center/users selected OR no data
Test Steps:
1. View page with no selections
2. View page with selections but no data
3. Check UI state
Expected Result:
1. Empty table shown gracefully
2. No error messages for intentional empty states
3. User understands why no data shown
4. Clear call-to-action to select filters

Test Description: Verify all data-testid attributes present
Test Steps:
1. Inspect all major elements
2. Check for data-testid attributes
3. Verify test automation compatibility
Expected Result:
1. All major elements have data-testid
2. IDs follow naming convention
3. Elements are testable via Playwright
4. No duplicate IDs exist

Test Description: Verify baseFilteredData memoization
Test Steps:
1. Apply filters
2. Trigger re-render without filter change
3. Monitor computation
Expected Result:
1. useMemo prevents unnecessary recalculation
2. Only recomputes when dependencies change
3. Performance optimized for large datasets

Test Description: Verify filteredAndSortedData memoization
Test Steps:
1. Trigger re-render
2. Monitor sort computation
3. Check optimization
Expected Result:
1. Sorting only occurs when dependencies change
2. useMemo prevents redundant sorts
3. Large datasets handled efficiently

Test Description: Verify useCallback for event handlers
Test Steps:
1. Check handleRowUpdate callback
2. Check other handlers
3. Monitor re-renders
Expected Result:
1. useCallback prevents function recreation
2. Dependencies properly defined
3. Child components don't re-render unnecessarily

Test Description: Verify API call deduplication
Test Steps:
1. Rapidly select same center multiple times
2. Monitor network requests
3. Check fetchInProgressRef
Expected Result:
1. Only one API call made per center
2. fetchInProgressRef blocks concurrent calls
3. lastFetchedCenterRef prevents duplicates

Test Description: Verify table component integration
Test Steps:
1. Observe table rendering
2. Check prop passing
3. Test interactions
Expected Result:
1. All required props passed correctly
2. Table receives filteredAndSortedData
3. Callbacks work: onSort, onCollectorChange, onCallerChange
4. Table renders without errors

Test Description: Verify search filter component integration
Test Steps:
1. Interact with search filter
2. Check filter state
3. Verify communication
Expected Result:
1. onFilterChange callback works
2. initialFilters prop set correctly
3. Filter changes propagate to parent
4. Two-way data flow functions

Test Description: Verify banner component integration
Test Steps:
1. Check banner display
2. Verify props
Expected Result:
1. heading shows 'LMS'
2. subHeading shows 'Down Payment'
3. Banner renders in correct position

Test Description: Verify loading overlay integration
Test Steps:
1. Trigger data load
2. Observe overlay
3. Check props
Expected Result:
1. isLoading prop controls visibility
2. message shows 'Loading DownPayment Collections'
3. dataTestId set correctly
4. Overlay disappears after load

Test Description: Verify collectionType DP is sent
Test Steps:
1. Monitor API call
2. Check parameters
Expected Result:
1. collectionType parameter = 'DP'
2. Required for backend filtering
3. Ensures only DownPayment collections returned

Test Description: Verify role code case-insensitive matching
Preconditions: Users with various role code formats
Test Steps:
1. Load users with different case role codes
2. Check filtering
Expected Result:
1. Role codes normalized to uppercase
2. hasAllowedRoleCode works case-insensitively
3. Users filtered correctly regardless of case

Test Description: Verify user transformation to dropdown format
Test Steps:
1. Fetch users
2. Check transformed format
Expected Result:
1. Transformed user has: id, name, roleCode, userRole, role
2. transformUser handles various field names
3. Consistent format for dropdowns

Test Description: Verify hasValidData helper function
Test Steps:
1. Check collections with unassigned users
2. Verify validation
Expected Result:
1. hasValidData returns false for null/empty objects
2. Returns false when object has no id
3. Returns true for valid user objects

Test Description: Verify handling when center has no collections
Test Steps:
1. Select center with no collections
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. API returns empty data array
2. Table shows empty state
3. Toast shows API message (e.g., 'No collections found')
4. No errors occur

Test Description: Verify search with special characters
Test Steps:
1. Enter special characters in search
2. Observe filtering
Expected Result:
1. Search handles special chars safely
2. No regex errors
3. Matching works or returns empty
4. No crashes

Test Description: Verify handling of very long search input
Test Steps:
1. Enter very long string in search
2. Observe performance
Expected Result:
1. Search completes without hang
2. Results filtered correctly
3. Performance acceptable
4. No memory issues

Test Description: Verify handling of rapid filter toggling
Test Steps:
1. Rapidly change filters multiple times
2. Observe state stability
Expected Result:
1. State updates correctly
2. No race conditions
3. Final state reflects last change
4. No UI glitches

Test Description: Verify behavior when center has no users
Test Steps:
1. Select center with empty user list
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
1. Empty collectors/callers arrays
2. Dropdowns show no options
3. No assignment possible
4. No errors occur

Test Description: Verify null safety for center handling
Test Steps:
1. Pass null as selectedCenter
2. Check error handling
Expected Result:
1. No crash occurs
2. getCenterId returns undefined
3. No API call made
4. Empty state shown

Test Description: Verify handling of unexpected API response format
Test Steps:
1. Simulate malformed API response
2. Observe error handling
Expected Result:
1. Error caught in try-catch
2. Error message displayed
3. Empty data shown
4. User can retry

Test Description: Verify keyboard navigation works
Test Steps:
1. Use Tab key to navigate
2. Use Enter to interact
3. Check focus indicators
Expected Result:
1. All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
2. Focus indicators visible
3. Logical tab order
4. Enter/Space activate buttons

Test Description: Verify screen reader support
Test Steps:
1. Navigate page with screen reader
2. Check announcements
3. Verify labels
Expected Result:
1. All elements properly labeled
2. State changes announced
3. Table structure understood by screen reader
4. ARIA attributes present where needed

Test Description: Verify sufficient color contrast
Test Steps:
1. Check all text/background combos
2. Use contrast checker tool
3. Verify WCAG compliance
Expected Result:
1. All text meets WCAG AA standards
2. Interactive elements clearly distinguishable
3. Disabled states visible
4. Error states clear

Test Description: Verify center switch clears previous data
Test Steps:
1. Select Center A (load data)
2. Select Center B (load data)
3. Observe data change
Expected Result:
1. Center B data replaces Center A data completely
2. No mixing of data between centers
3. Filters reset appropriately

Test Description: Verify filters combine correctly in all scenarios
Test Steps:
1. Test all filter combinations
2. Verify AND logic
3. Check edge cases
Expected Result:
1. All filters applied with AND logic
2. No filters ignored
3. Results always match all active filters
4. Consistent behavior

Test Description: Verify sort persists through filter changes
Test Steps:
1. Sort data by column
2. Apply/change filters
3. Check sort state
Expected Result:
1. Sort configuration maintained
2. Filtered data is also sorted
3. Sort direction doesn't reset
4. User intent preserved

Test Description: Verify withCredentials flag is set
Test Steps:
1. Monitor network requests
2. Check request configuration
3. Verify credentials
Expected Result:
1. All API calls have withCredentials: true
2. Cookies/auth sent with requests
3. CORS headers handled correctly

Test Description: Verify users filtered by allowed roles only
Test Steps:
1. Load users for center
2. Check displayed users
3. Verify filtering
Expected Result:
1. Only ALLOWED_COLLECTOR_ROLE_CODES shown for collectors
2. Only ALLOWED_CALLER_ROLE_CODES shown for callers
3. Unauthorized roles excluded
4. Security maintained

Test Description: Verify unassigned includes either collector OR caller empty
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Unassigned' filter
2. Observe results
Expected Result:
1. Collections with empty collector shown
2. Collections with empty caller shown
3. Collections with both empty shown
4. OR logic applied correctly

Test Description: Verify user match works for collector OR caller
Test Steps:
1. Select specific user
2. Check filtered results
Expected Result:
1. Collections where user is collector shown
2. Collections where user is caller shown
3. OR logic for user matching
4. All relevant collections included

Test Description: Verify Unassigned + Users selection logic
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Unassigned' + specific users
2. Observe filtered results
Expected Result:
1. Shows unassigned collections
2. Shows collections assigned to selected users
3. Union of both sets (OR logic)
4. Comprehensive results
